events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
System classified the issue as a refund request based on keywords indicating the customer wants their money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I haven't worn it yet, and it is still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund promptly. Please expect the amount to be credited back to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick reply and clear instructions. I appreciate your help with this refund process.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. If you encounter any issues with the transaction, please reach out again.
